name: Desolately
description:
This game is about loneliness  which was  inspired  using Edward Hopper's life creating a prototype game like Dodge 'Em , what could go wrong... well nothing.

How to play:

Collect coins to increase your score

Arrow keys to move

Space = Handbrake

If you roll over or stuck, pressing Enter will make you flip back or unstuck

Pressing ESC will close the game

Score I got from collecting all the coins was 123
